original: 巴西漢昌人，蜀漢中後期大將。歷史上記載甚少，只提及句扶與王平、張翼、廖化並列，功績僅略亞於王平。
text: Brazilian Hanchang native, general in the middle and late period of Shuhan. There are very few records in history, only mentioning that Jufu is juxtaposed with Wang Ping, Zhang Yi, and Liao Hua, whose achievements are only slightly inferior to Wang Ping.
